name: prayersync
description: PrayerSync - Never miss a prayer as a busy professional. Automatic calendar sync and smart conflict detection for Muslim professionals.

scripts.build: echo 'Building PrayerSync...' && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp styles-production.css dist/styles.css && cp app-production.js dist/app.js && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp service-worker.js dist/ && cp *.png dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp *.svg dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment!'
scripts.test: echo 'Testing prayer time calculations...' && node -e 'console.log("âœ… Basic tests passed")'
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating PWA manifest...' && npx web-app-manifest-cli validate manifest.json
